attributes.action: Influence Government of Pakistan to restore Supreme Court of Pakistan, Anull the PCO, liberate the Media and release all Judges and political workers, including Mr. Imran Khan (Chairman Movement for Justice in Pakistan), at the earliest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the citizens of Pakistan, reject and denounce the acts of General Musharraf on Nov. 03, 2007. After the unconstitutional acts of yesterday the Government of Pakistan started a crackdown on the Judiciary by arresting the senior judges of the Supreme Courts and the High Courts of the country. Further, several political leaders have been arrested, including Mr. Imran Khan – Chairman Pakistan Tehrik – e – Insaf, and have been kept at undisclosed locations. We appeal to all international peace loving and human rights organizations to take serious note of these developments. We demand all the international organizations to pressurize the current Government of General Musharraf to:

1.	Abide by the decision of larger bench of Supreme Court of Pakistan and scrap the PCO and the Emergency. 
2.	Restore the Supreme Court of Pakistan.
3.	Release Mr. Imran Khan safely and all other political leaders.
4.	Respect the Human Rights of citizens of Pakistan as they are also human beings, contrary to the speech of General Musharraf who doubts the same, like citizens of other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
